review: I DIDNT DIE SO MUCH IN CS GO DEATH MATCH. TAKE YOUR BUGS AND CHEATERS AND I MAY CONSIDER COMING BACK AGAIN. UNTIL THAT DAY I WILL NOT PLAY THE GAME. MY REVIEW WASTE OF MONEY.Ok Lets give a real review of the game. If you are considering to buy this game and have fun DONT BUY. Because you will not have fun at all. Game does not promise any fun. It tickles your nerves and makes you addicted this way. Not by providing any kind of fun. 1. You will start on a lobby where everyone is gathered and then you'll get a plane to land some playground on the map.2. If you are lucky person the circle will cover the location you landed but keep in mind that most probably you'll have to run inside the circle. 3. You have to find a shelter as your foot touches on the ground or you'll get killed in 3 4 seconds. 4. If you are a lucky person you'll find some armor and guns where you're hiding. Or you will not. You'll get killed either way. 5. If you have loaded your guns and still alive You'll get killed in couple of minutes or three. 6. Stay away from the airdrops. Stay away from the windows and stay away from the villages. IMO Stay away from this game. 7. If you're sure that you can get yourself to "winner winner Chicken dinner" you'll not. Stop dreaming.8. This game probably made by a company where only one person working and he's a lazy guy There are tons of optimization issues errors bugs and like all these are not enough there are cheaters who'll kill you from behind a mountain. They will always see you where you're hiding. And development team cannot solve it. I dont believe there will be a stable version of the game.9. If you want to have fun there are youtube videos that is showing how to cheat how to script etc. Unless no fun.Go buy some other games that you can have fun.

review: Updated Im not saying its bad it is not. The review will only have the cons i noticed (and thats all cons there is) because they made me delete the game anyway. It's not very optimized in order to get 144fps + epic view distance "most" of the time i need to lower the settings quite bit and that makes it look quite potato. (I like to balance performance and quality this wasnt possible.) Enemies are rather hard to spot and better headphones with good voice surrounding will be more than crucial in order to do well in this game I dont have those and did not plan to get that is the reason I never really played it that much. It's pretty slowpaced. I'm just tired in general about that typical "as realistic as possible" theme I've played cs go and other games for quite long time it isnt love to MY eyes this doesnt possibly affect you though. Bugs Not really that bad ones.Points to the team for handeling my bug fix report nicely answering and fixing it during the time of early access It felt really great. But now theyre trying to sue everyone to keep the whole competition away instead of improving the game which is ridiculous.To the players who had alot of hours in it admit it. When you play you play with friends friends are the fun here.If i were to be asked to recommend a battle royale game I know much better one and its free. You already know what it is. Therefore i will change my "Recommended" to "Not recommended" This game is "fine" but i cannot recommend it.

review: This game is very unique and quite entertaining. The game does have its problems however I do not feel that the negatives outweigh the positives. It allows for a different style of competitive play that makes it challeneging on a new level. The feeling of winning a match truly feels earned and everyone is always on the same level unless you just end up incredibly unlucky. The latest patch really improved the game quite a lot and I'm hoping this is a sign for things to come.

review: I'm left with mixed feelings after playing this game for a while.To start with the 1.0 release did not improve the performance I still can't play it on my PC I had some expectations for the full release and it didn't meet most of them.Regarding gameplay I think the most annoying thing in this game is trying to figure out where shots are coming from. I think the audio needs improvement in this case although you can tell where the shooter is if he is close at greater distances you can't rely on the sound anymore.I also don't like that you can't decide the map you want to play on the game does that for you I think there's a 50 50 chance regardless I want the option to play on the map I prefer.I also want to have my own private games and I can't see why it's too much to ask. Wanna practice? Wanna improve your shots? Yeah tough luck because you have to be some kind of content creator to have your own custom games. I really hope they make it available to everyone because it really feels like I'm being denied basic features a game like this should have because I'm not a god damned content creator. I want to warm up before my games I want to practice I want to experiment I WANT BASIC GAME FEATURES THAT FREE GAMES OFFER AT THIS POINT!This game made a lot of money like A LOT of money I can't see why it's not doing so well in terms of completing the game invest in some developers I don't understand how hard it can be.

review: This game is fun and challenging at the same time which makes it great! However there are some major issues that need to be worked out for it to receive a 5/5.My number one pet peeve is that every so often the game will freeze (usually during transitions either from looking at inventory for instance or loading the main menu.) When it does this the game permanently stays on the screen so I have to restart my computer in order to use it again. The sooner this bug is fixed the better.The second thing I want to mention is the amount of lag this game has. It isn't all the time but enough to take note. Also the amount of lag is so bad that it makes me jump a couple feet leaving me disoriented. I assume the other players may not have this same issue since one of them killed me while this happened but either way this is a big problem. Other than my perviously stated concerns this game is all around fun to play. It is hard to know where people are shooting you sometimes even if I know the direction they are shooting but maybe (it's just me?) that will change with more experience? Anyways keep up with the progress developers you have something of value here. I'll rate it a 3/5 until the issues are fixed. Thank you.Update It has come to my attention that the devs aren't honest people and went back on a promise. Regardless of what that promise was that is something you do not do. It's the principle of the matter! If people accept and brush off these broken promises like it was nothing then those people are giving them the right to lie again in the future and the right to manipulate those people because they know they can do it since they already have done it.On top of this the devs keep adding more things into the game when the properties and functions in the game still aren't fixed. I believe they have gotten worse tbh. The game freezes more then it has and the rendering has gotten worse. I literally have to wait a minute or two before everything is ready for me to interact with it where in the past this problem only happened rarely. The game lags a bit here and there even with everything set to low and it lags when people are near which is a dead give away.It seems to me that the devs listened and was on the right track then gave up half way after they got their money. If this is not the case then I would be happy to be proven wrong but from what I've seen this is definitely the case. As cool as this game was it's not worth getting until/if these devs get their act together.

review: With over 100 hours in the game I can now say I'm sad about the state of this game. When I purchased this game it was early access and we waited forever for the one update to hopefully fix the insanely poor buggy game. The game is fun and its a insane to actually win . But the combat works better with close quater combat rather than the games constantly wanting long range. Most of the guns you will find are close quarters with a splattering of long range guns (good luck finding a scope to use said rifle once you find it). Then we are lead into the cheaters and poor optimized game. At the current moment most cheaters are seeming to come from china and the developer refuses to give china their own region locked server even though that would solve and Unknown himself calls the players asking for that xenophopic for even suggesting it. The developer seems to priotize how the game looks rather than make the game not run like even with a rig with more than enough power to run it. Please fix the game. It can be fun. Please focus on the bugs and the preformance. Listen to the community on this one because we have a point sometimes.

Make sure you wear head phones and listen to every little sound to track people's location and find them before they find you. It can also be get a bit boring or frustrating when you are running miles through fields with no cover and getting shot or hide in a room all round and die for no reason. The best selling video game of all time.

review: Great game but frustrating for two main reasons communication and hackers. The game is full of hackers. I would say of my last 10 deaths at least 7 have been from cheaters. It is incredibly frustrating to make it to the top 20 or 10 then get demolished by someone clearly cheating (aimbot/wallhacks/etc). Earlier this morning there was a hacker shooting into the sky / ground and killing people halfway across the circle. Good times. The second most frustrating part of this game is the NA servers are flooded with chinese players that dont speak english. PUBG really needs to do some sort of location lock on their servers. In a game where communication is crucial nothing is more frustating than not being able to. Teaming up with friends is a must!Besides that this game has incredible potential and I would reccomend it.

review: So after 13 hours of gameplay I have to say that I am really impressed. The game is a giant map where 100 players scavenge weapons and fight to the death. I am having an amazing time playing this game. It can be very challenging and hard when you first start but after a few hours of grinding youll be just as good as anyone. Its very easy to find weapons and find people to kill. Its very immersive and has a wide variety of weapons to choose from. A lot of people say they have issues with the game but I havnt encountered anything too bad. Sometimes i'll experience lag not fps drop but like the kind that makes you teleport. Other than that no problems what so ever. I would recommend this game. I love it and I will put a lot of hours on it. I love the shooting animations and gun mechanics. They really did a good job with that. The sounds are cool and the guns and sights look legit. When you fire your weapon and head shot someone youll ejaculate in your pants. Its better than Arma's battle royalle. Like when you shoot someone they will die instantly and not like 10 seconds later. I havnt played H1Z1 but judging by the videos ive seen this is the perfected more realistic version. The co op in this game is really fun and easy to use. I also love the driving. Its very easy and it doesnt require any building or missing parts. Just dont jump out of it while moving or youll die.Pros Edgy Good graphics Immersive Fun Great weapon mechanics Great matchmaking and co op system Good driving mechanicsCons Buggy Stressful at times (youll rage really hard when a dude with a pistol one shots you when you got a whole tone of rare I highly recoomend this game to anyone who is a fan of the whole battle royale scene. Its the best one so far.

review: * The game runs good now *How the game runs for me 90% of the time https //www.youtube.com/watch?v HNaN98Ows cYes it's early access and there can be lags and performance issues but in 6 hours of playing I managed to finish only two matches. On the rest I get "Lost connection to host" either while I'm still in the parachute or after around 10 20 minutes. In around 90% of those matches I was teleporting around a lot constantly (every few seconds). Every action I want to perform takes arounds 5 10 seconds (like opening doors switch weapon or pick up items). That's not exaggerated.So at the moment the game isn't ready for early access and it is not playable at all. Patches don't seem to address these problems. Support sites are flooded with similar problems and thus have high response time.I really wanted to give this game a chance but as long as the servers and netcode aren't good I am not able to get this game to work properly.Edit Got 27h playtime now and the problems above are still present. I'll change this review when the netcode gets better. Just fyi I can play other online games just fine. Even though my internet connection is bad this games networking is worse. Not early access ready.Edit2 By now the performance is better and the game is playable. It still has it's bugs and weaknesses but all in all those are minor. I'll change the review to thumb up.

review: So first I want to say that this game is a must buy for those who like FPS battle royals looting or dying to cheaters. It is great. The game feels smooth (though there can be latency occasionally) the weapons require skill to use with their recoil and the gunplay is quite fun. Buy it and try it. You won't regret it.Now to the bad side. It was made by an indi developer (which is awesome) but they seem to be having a lot of trouble keeping up with hacks (which is not awesome). I've read that they are banning tens of thousands of hackers yet coming across someone shooting through buildings jump headshotting or just not making noise as they run is while not frequent fairly common. In fact all you have to do to find a few cheaters is to look at the leaderboards where some players have k/d ratios slightly higher than their IQ's. It can be incredibly frustrating to work your way through the game gear up then get to one of the final circles where some 12 year old with his parents' credit card bought a handful of mods and is headshotting a player after player as fast as his Kar 98 can fire....while inside a building. Again it doesn't happen often but just enough to really make you want to question playing until it gets fixed.That said it is well worth the money and to be honest....it's still in Alpha. I'm hopeful better cheater preventions will be in place once it reaches release. As for now if you can handle little buying their way to the occasional win give it a go. You won't be dissapointed.RELEASE VERSION EDIT Okay now that the game is released I just wanted to update my review. So some new things like a really detailed new map and several new weapons. Those are great. Also the game seems to run much smoother than it did a few months ago. Now to the REALLY bad part. Cheating has gone through the roof. It's now to the point where you WILL see cheaters....every game. People running faster than cars one shoting you with guns that don't do near enough damage to one shot plus the classic ESP and no recoil hacks. And the frequency is INSANE. There seems to be a common thread to most of the hackers/cheater. They all have Chinese names. Now this is a recent occurance because at release Asia now has access to use NA and EU servers. It seems the new "Gold Farming" is in full swing. They use hacks to win games and farm point to sell crates. I've been seeing posts where people who speak Mandarin are hearing other chinese people in the lobbies telling others where to meet up to team against non asian players. It's to the point where you just can't play a fair game. If Blue Hole doesn't do something about requiring region locks this game will take a big nosedive. You can't release a really popular Early Release product have a bunch of new people buy it at release then have them see that you almost MUST cheat to win. It will be the end of PUBG if it isn't fixed and soon.So for now avoid buying the game. Hopefully things will change until it does DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Great game to play with friends or by yourself. But it does have many problems. The devs of the game hardly listen to the community when it comes to things that they want or things that should be removed. The headshots and hit registration in general is screwey most of the time. You can drop and not see anyone for the entire time up until the top 10 then get headshotted by a Kar98 for that split second you stop behind a tree or rock. You can get stuck in the map stuck in vehicles stuck in objects and stuck in buildings. You can be driving a car and hit a pebble which sends you flying into outer space or nudge your teammate with it and knock them out. As well as everyones favorite trying to drop on the rooftop of a building but your paraschute gets moved by a ghost and stuck on a railing then be forced to cut the rope and lose 50% of your health. Granted it does have plenty of bugs and issues that need to be solved it's still fun to play and challenging at the same time.

review: the most rewarding game I have ever played as far as how you feel when you come out of a gun fight alive.. dying especially early in the round after chuting in can be very frustrating.. I wish this was first person only or at least they had a first person only mode im not used to the third person it does help new players if you can get used to it cause you can rotate the camera all around you like in arma. but i never played those games was too klunky for me and the inventory and stuff was not very intuitive for my liking.. this game gets it right but i would still rather everyone be in first person so you could sneak up on people better.. yet it could also happen to you being inside a house camping and being able to see all around the building while your hiding is cheap in my opinion especially since the stakes are SO HIGH in this game.. a few shots and your dead. That being said.. its VERY addicting and I am getting better and better the more I play it. I also wish there were other game modes.. one where u could die spawn back in and keep playing. like TDM or something.. it would help with getting to know the game better w/out being sent straight to the character screen over a mistake

review: The game itself is decent. A lot of people complain about performance issues I have not had those problems. I can't run it on absolute max settings but I run it decently enough. There is a high learning curve to the weapons because you so rarely get an opportunity to USE the weapons. The recent changes to the circle speeds have been great. There are still a fair amount of issues detailed below that should be resolved. Also there are still more than a few hackers/cheaters. Things like mouse macros that fire a semi auto gun at a high speed with very little recoil is still a problem. I report when I can but I can only do that if that person ended up killing me. There is also the problem of increased microtransactions for this game and they don't seem to be ready for it. I and a lot of other players according to a google search have purchased keys for the locked crates and never got them more on that below. Overall its a good game it could be optimized a bit more for better frame rates and it needs to either make some changes to the microtransaction system (keys) or get rid of it and have locked crates be a rarity rather than the norm again. Until they fix some of these issues no I don't recommend it. Things I like No chat system. I can just play a game without having to see a bunch of slurs scroll past me in a chat window on my screen which is an annoyance in most games. Until recently the guns were realistic not balanced. I wish they hadn't of made that change. Some guns in real life are better than others. There is a reason why the army doesn't issue tommy guns any more. The replay feature. Its nice to be able to go back and record funny moments or see what happened to the person I was shooting at that disappeared. Things that they need to add An offline shooting range so you can get experience with the weapons and figure out what you are most comfortable with.The loot algorithms I play a lot of games where I will search 15 buildings and find only a red dot sight then games where I find 3 4x ACOG scopes in a single room. Yes I know it is random but maybe pure random isn't the best option. More support or less microtransactions. I bought 5 keys a week ago never received them. I put a support ticket in and it has yet to be resolved. Unfortunately since most of the crates now require keys this is a problem. Microtransactions are supposed to be impulse buys with no hassle and instant gratification. If you don't have the abitily to do that maybe don't have microtransactions.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I've been playing PUBG since the early access jumping to try each update etc but since PUBG is already at its Final stage there's still alot of issues unsolved since the early access.Pros Great UI design. Pretty fun as arcade game ( not always see in the cons ). Potential with new Custom Games ( War Mode etc ).Cons Terrible Sound system both locational/positional and effects wise. For example in many cases the crack is misplaced with actual gunfire making it confusing to locate enemies ( "but you can practice and learn how to hear it" thats not an excuse ).Suppresed weapons too silent. Clunky controls ( especially on the door opening vaulting ADS if youre laying down next to tree sometimes the ADS becomes pretty buggy ). Terrible developer team ( Trying to sue Epic Games etc ) Mediocore graphics for 2018 game Team focuses on making good money not good game.Overall H1Z1 on steroids. Good battle royale arcade game but as BR shooter simulation its totally not recommended.

review: As far as games go PUBG is as simple a concept as it gets. In this online multiplayer shooter up to 100 players are parachuted onto a large map and start off with no gear aside from cosmetic clothing options that don t impact gameplay. On landing you ll have to scavenge for guns grenades items and armour which are distributed at random killing players as you come across them. You can switch between first person and third person perspectives and i preferre the latter as it allows for a wider field of view letting us spot enemies faster.Sounds simple enough? Well there's an added complication. The game map shrinks every few minutes forcing you to relocate to a new area and damaging you until you do. Failing to enter a new safe zone results in death. If you re the last player standing you re greeted with the phrase winner winner chicken dinner . You get in game currency at the end of each round that you can use towards purchasing cosmetic gear to kit out your character.

review: A great concept for a game but the delivery of it by this developer team has been very poor for over a year now. There is no communication. No roadmap to fix known issues or introduce new ingame items. The solution to the hacking problem is simple and i cant believe it hasnt been implemented. You NEED to introduce Verified account match making. These hackers are ruining the game. You can put in a region lock.. You can put in a ping lock on.. but really it won't work! The only solution to this is for long term account holders to play against eachother and the hackers and smurfs battle it out against eachother. Also if someone is reported for hacking and proven to be a hacker just remove their name from the leaderboard it's such a simple concept and easy to implement. Devs need to pick up their game LITTERALLY.Other than that the graphics maps game play are all okay. Just FIX THE HACKING ISSUE PLEASE!!!!

review: PC Specs.CPU Intel Core i7 6700K Processor 4.10 GHzGPU EVGA GTX 1080 FTWPSU Doesn't really matter now does it...Motherboard ASUS Z170SRam G.SKILL 2x8GB 2400Hard Drive Some s*itty seagate 2tbOverview 60fps constant I use vsyncFrames are not the issue for mePros I like the weapons they are good. Gameplay is fun s*it gets real intense at the end Nades are actually useful Cons game is very poorly optimized. region lock china Vehicles suck complete balls. Random glitches all the time. region lock china Hitboxes suck (Probably has to do with the fact they run at 17tick lol). Chinese c*nts are pretty annoying. region lock china LOTS of cheaters devs neglect the reports. (about 1/8 games you die to a cheater) region lock china region lock china region lock china No regard for bug fixing. s*it gets real intense at the end... Then your game crashes or get killed by a cheater across the map... region lock china region lock china region lock china horrible desync region lock china clientside everything allows for cheaters to easily cheat. bullets are clientside so they can be shooting a wall and modifying the possition of the bullets to hit people in the head... region lock china tickrate is low and casues for hit registry not to work. Every game since the start of 2018 I can hardly get kills. The bullets do not register on players when shooting. I have gone through many tests on many different servers and it seems to be a persistant issue. What will happen is I will load about 20 30 bullets on a player before they die. Around half of the shots are headshots. However sometimes I am only able to get 5 or 6 shots on them and 2 or 3 are head shots. And they end up killing me. Once I watch the replay I see that I hit them 6 times but on their screen I did not hit them once. This game is so F**KING broken it literally ticks me off. It's so sad that the mobile version is better made and optimized than this trash. This issue has existed since the launch and they still ignore the fact people complain about the 17tick. F**k Bluehole. They're a bunch of dumb ch*nks.Overall 1.5/10I would not recommended this game at its current state and considering the devs probably not in the future either.

review: The specs that the game says you need is just wrong because i have way better stuff than what it need and I only play the game around 40 to 100fps (Avg of 55) I'm not joking. The game is terribly optimized and need to be fixed. I recommend a Core I5 6th Gen and up and a GTX 1060 6GB better. Fair warning that this game will make your PC scream because this game makes your PC very goddamn hot. LIke I play most games at 65c and this game never goes play 78c under minimal load. So basically only buy this game if you are a rich person because you need a beast of a PC. This game also has many glitchesLike I don't play Fortnite but like I know understand why people like Fortnite better. One you don't need a beast PC. Second of all it's free. Last of all the game is less serious and more to have a fun time. There are also many cheaters and also be prepared for people with either hacks or a beast PC to flick on you when you are only playing at 40 fps. In summary only buy this game if you have a beast PC and also that be ready for many glitches and bugs.

review: # What I had written before 1.0 releaseLove it. It is hard to learn but awesome to win! Movement model is a pita atm but will get better.# After the 1.0 releaseBluehole didn't fix so many issues which are totally essential to good gameplay so i lost interest in this game as it is so frustrating. Just to name a few constant client crashes FPS issues constant lag rubber banding horrible network code (sync) looting with TAB vs F ignores animations so it is fast car model broken (driving does not make much fun) and the bike kills you for now reason lobby is still horrible no shooting range for weapon practice parachute landing bugs bullets not hitting shotguns suck in this game headshots not counting pistol aiming in particular but some other crosshairs also are so useless and confusing yeah ... and so on.A positive thing is they got rid of the cheaters on the desktop version which were a constant issue when i was playing last. Also funny to note that the mobile client which was done by a different company does not crash and friends enjoy the games while the desktop client is still horrible.Totally annoyed by this so i stopped playing PUBG.

review: A lot of people are hyping this game. Playing it a lot and uploading videos about it and reporting some very positive reviews. My issues with this game don't come at the heart of the game itself. The idea of the game isn't new though. PlayerUnknown's last game H1Z1 was very similar and although it plays a little different the mechanics are generally the same. But for having the same mechanics and roughly the same graphics the game runs so terrible. Melee is the most unreliable thing in the game. Machete crowbar....it doesn't matter. Hit the guy four or five times? Nope. The lag is definitely real in this game and topple that with random freezes and a limited FOV and the game isn't worth the cost for pre release gaming. Wait for the game to mature because it's frustrating playing an unfinished game that has tearing glitchy graphics dropped frames and random drops.EDIT So the game has had a lot of work done on it and I like the direction it's taking. It still hasn't been optimized so a lot of times the game is twitchy and glitchy and just generally laggy. Servers seem like they can't keep up with all the input from a hundred gamers especially early game. I think this is an issue that can't be solved with brute force as the map is too big and you only need all that raw horsepower in the very beginning before half the server dies and then things really smooth out. So it might take some time before it's really honed but as for the state of the game in pre release it's gotten a lot better and I love playing this game now.

review: The game itself is fun running around collecting weapons and items while running/hiding from people and winning a battle can get the adrenaline going. It's just unfortunate that the amount of hackers and lack of bug fixes makes this game unplayable. It's very upsetting when you're on a bike going over a bridge and crash for no apparent reason or are running for zone and get shot through the wall by a hacker with mini and a 4X. I don't understand what keeps this company from introducing a better anti cheat system that clearly everyone is asking for unless they are getting money from the hack creaters themselves. This is insane that a game that was once amazing has turned into something no one wants to play. You would think they would want to make their game more enjoyable to play for everyone but I guess that isn't one of their top priorites since it won't be bringing them any money.

review: This was not my first BR game I like many others was first introduced to this genre through H1Z1. After playing 700+ hrs of that I thought that I would be done with BR games. After seeing the downfall of that I was nervous to give PUBG a try. Now 900+ hrs later...... I have played few games as much as this one in my time. Not much regret at all. From the intense gun fights that force you to make split second descisions. To the sniping long range watch the bullt drop for the headshot. This game proves heart racing final fights as the zone shrinks around you. Great to play with friends have had a lot of fun playing duos and squads with many people. I consider myself a very good player at this game as well so seeing the progress of this game has dissapointed me. The future could be bright with new maps and added content but so far the lack of optimization has been a big factor with my decline in playtime for me. I would still recommend this game to anyone but its not for everyone. 8 out of 10.

review: More than often seeing a $30 early access game leaves you thinking "why the hell would I buy another trashy survival game for such a high amount when it has so many issues " PUBG is not one of those $30 early access survival game. Many of the other early access survival games lack content and/or depth on top of the bugs and/or poor optimization. While PUBG does suffer from the latter (more so poor optimization than bugs though they do exist) its gameplay is tense and exciting which makes it worth suffering through the lag and desyncs. If you want to competently run this game you're going to need a NASA computer but hopefully that will change in the near future as the devs have been focused on fixing lag and what not recently. I was also really worried that $30 would go out the window as I was afraid that after the streamers stopped playing two weeks in the game would drop off the edge. Luckily for me (and the devs) there is still a constant player base of both the public and of the streamers keeping promotion up. This game is amazing with friends but still fun without. 11/10 would recommend possibly the best $30 I've ever spent.Edit 11/23/17. The game continues to break but Bluehole is continuing to create a great game with new content. Regardless of all of the negativity about this game I still would absolutely recommend it.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This was one of my favorite games when it first came out. Was over the COD/Battlefield BS and this game was very hardcore with 2 3 chest shot kills and 1 2 head shot kills. Unfortunately recently they have made changes I'm guessing to appeal to the COD crowd to get them to play. So now just like COD you can shoot someone center mass 6 7 8 9 10 times hell dump the whole mag in them and somehow they are still alive and well then turn around and shoot you in the head 1 time even though you have a level 2 or 3 helmet and down you go. So unless they go back to and more realistic hardcore 2 3 shot kill game like it was in the beginning I can't recommend this game. Not to mention the sync and lag issues which may be contributing to above stated. If you are a COD fan and want another game like COD that isn't in outer space or whatever they are doing now then I guess this is the game for you in its current state. If you want a different game that was suppose to be more realistic like I think the way it was intended to now is not the time to buy. When it first came out I felt like everyone pretty much had a chance. Now if you don't spend 50 hrs a week playing it you are screwed.

review: I am sick and tired of hitting the ground in the middle of a massive game and nothing is loaded. No building is rendered and all the textures are trash. No matter what my graphically settings are its always the same. Too many times Ive been gunned down while waiting for the game to load. How can Radical Heights an alpha release not have such game breaking issues yet PUBG does? Fortnite doesn't either nor does ROE. With so many battle royals on the market I'd hoped PUBG would've stepped up their game but no it hasnt and now its being left in the dust. The mobile games that Bluehole loves to sue all the time have more stable experiences then this. Until this kind of thing is fixed this game is neither unplayable.
